member.name: M:Intent.Metadata.RDBMS.Api.ClassModelUniqueConstraintExtensions.GetUniqueConstraints(Intent.Modelers.Domain.Api.ClassModel)
member.summary: Gets the unique constraints specified for this class in the Domain designer.

member.name: P:Intent.Metadata.RDBMS.Api.ClassModelUniqueConstraintExtensions.UniqueConstraint.ConstraintName
member.summary: The name of the constraint. Will be null if it was not specified.

member.name: T:Intent.Metadata.RDBMS.Api.ClassModelUniqueConstraintExtensions.UniqueConstraintField
member.summary: Represents a field associated by a unique constraint.

member.name: P:Intent.Metadata.RDBMS.Api.ClassModelUniqueConstraintExtensions.UniqueConstraintField.Name
member.summary: Name of the Attribute or Association

member.name: P:Intent.Metadata.RDBMS.Api.ClassModelUniqueConstraintExtensions.UniqueConstraintField.ColumnName
member.summary: The column name specified. Will be null unless explicitly specified by a Column or Foreign Key stereotype.
